meanings.sent1: The tahsildar collected taxes from the villagers.
meanings.sent2: The villagers went to the tahsildar to pay their taxes.
meanings.sent3: The tahsildar joked that even the monkeys in the forest owed taxes.
meanings.sent4: The tahsildar was like a diligent ant, gathering every rupee owed.
meanings.sent5: The image of the tahsildar counting coins is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: The head of a tahsil in India
meanings.sent1: The tahsildar managed all the affairs of the tahsil.
meanings.sent2: People respected the tahsildar for his fair decisions.
meanings.sent3: The tahsildar accidentally wore his hat backward, causing laughter in the office.
meanings.sent4: The tahsildar stood tall like a guardian of the tahsil.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the tahsildar brought order and peace to the village.
